verbose_text: Similarly, in our study, although the total HSF1 expression was decreased in the pancreatic tissue of the L-arginine-induced mice with ANP, the ratio of acetylated HSF1 was sharply increased up to 6- to 8-fold of the normal mice, which may consequently increase the transcription of pro inflammatory factors (TNF-alpha and IL-6) but decrease the transcription of anti-inflammatory factors (IL-10).
